name: token-template
title: Token Template
desc: Modern and minimalistic Astro + Tailwind CSS starter designed for developers and creators. With a sleek black-and-white terminal-inspired design, it features support for Markdown (MD), MDX, RSS feeds, sitemaps, and fully static content, making it perfect for personal portfolios and blogs.
article:
Token is a modern and minimalistic Astro + Tailwind CSS starter designed for developers and creators. With a sleek black-and-white terminal-inspired design, it features support for Markdown (MD), MDX, RSS feeds, sitemaps, and fully static content, making it perfect for personal portfolios and blogs.

  • Static and Fast â Fully static content optimized for performance
